price: 19. Ya soló, bango bazali na bokoki ya kosalela yo bolamu te koleka bolamu ya Allah. Mpe ya soló, bato mabe bango na bango bazali baninga, Allah nde azali mobateli ya bandimi.
arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ لَن يُغۡنُواْ عَنكَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٖۖ وَٱللَّهُ وَلِيُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: innahum lan yugh'nū ʿanka mina al-lahi shayan wa-inna al-ẓālimīna baʿḍuhum awliyāu baʿḍin wal-lahu waliyyu al-mutaqīna
